author: CBC News
title: Frito-Lay stops shipping chips to Loblaws stores in pricing dispute | CBC News
description: One of Canada's biggest food manufacturers has halted shipments to the country's largest grocer in an extreme example of how inflation is impacting the food industry and driving a wedge between some retailers and suppliers.
